Forest Whitaker (mù yá na 15 Julaị 1961) bu onye Amerikạ bu ọmẹka
O mẹrịrị ihe onyinye ha na kpo Oscar maka o no na enyọ-na-ga ha kporo The Last King of Scotland, o mere ka Idi Amin na enyọ-na-ga nka hu
O mẹrịrị kwa ihe onyinye Golden Globe, na BAFTA
O bu Afrikan Amerikan ánó onye mẹrịrị onyinye Oscar maka Ọmẹka nke Nwoke di Mma, nạ o ná jé na Ijẹ Sidney Poitier, Denzel Washington, and Jamie Foxx
Mmpá Forest Whitaker bụ kwa onye Igbo ma mma ya bu onye Ghana.
